description: "Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!"
descriptionZh: “愚蠢的贱民！屈服于我！”
name: Abomination

description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你放置的上张卡牌有揭示效果且在场上，复制其卡面文字。
name: Absorbing Man

description: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.
descriptionZh: 每回合结束时，若你在此区域领先，抽一张牌。
name: Adam Warlock

description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played this turn to this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将本回合对手放置的最后一张卡牌移动至此区域。
name: Aero

description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.
descriptionZh: 阿加莎会在你的起始手牌中，并帮你出牌。
name: Agatha Harkness

description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：随机将1张卡牌添加到你的手牌。
name: Agent 13

description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：随机将初始能量消耗为4和5的各1张卡牌添加到手牌。
name: Agent Coulson

description: Starts on the bottom of your deck. Draw this on turn 6.
descriptionZh: 对战开始时，出现在你的卡组最底部。若先前回合未抽出，会在第六回合抽到此牌。
name: America Chavez

description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your deck to replace it.
descriptionZh: 当你的一张牌被摧毁后，卡组中的此牌会替换那张牌。
name: Angel

description: After you play a card here, +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 当你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，+2战力。
name: Angela

description: On Reveal: Each of your cards randomly chooses a location to move to.
name: Annihilus

description: Ongoing: If you have 3 other cards here, +3 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：若你在此区域有另外3张卡牌，+3战力。
name: Ant Man

description: When you discard this from your hand, put it back with +4 Power.
descriptionZh: 当你从手牌中丢弃此卡牌时，此卡牌+4战力并回到手牌中。
name: Apocalypse

description: Ongoing: Cards at this location can't be destroyed.
descriptionZh: 持续：此区域中的牌不能被摧毁。
name: Armor

description: On Reveal: Destroy a random friendly card here. Add copies of it to the other locations.
descriptionZh: 揭示：随机摧毁此区域中你的1张其他卡牌，将它的1张复制添加到其他各个区域。
name: Arnim Zola

description: If you have another card here at the end of your turn, destroy this.
descriptionZh: 若在你的回合结束时此区域有另一张牌，摧毁此牌。
name: Attuma

description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.
descriptionZh: 揭示：对手抽1张卡牌，其能量消耗将变为6。
name: Baron Mordo

description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你所有手牌的战力设为3。
name: Bast

description: On Reveal: Return your other cards at this location to your hand. They cost 1 less.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你在此区域的其他卡牌退回你的手牌中，并使其能量消耗-1。
name: Beast

description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 当你放置一张卡牌后，+1战力。
name: Bishop

description: On Reveal: Your opponent must discard the lowest-Cost card in their hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：对手必须丢弃手牌中能量消耗最低的卡牌。
name: Black Bolt

description: If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it.
descriptionZh: 若你的回合结束时此牌在你的手牌中，丢弃它。
name: Black Cat

description: When this is destroyed, draw a card.
descriptionZh: 当此卡牌被丢弃时，抽一张卡
name: Black Knight

description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：此牌战力翻倍。
name: Black Panther

description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将1张寡妇蛰添加到对手手牌。
name: Black Widow

description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：丢弃一张手牌。
name: Blade

description: You can move this each turn. When it moves, +1 Power.
name: Blink

description: Ongoing: Nothing can move this to another location.
name: Blob

description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：你所有的其他卡牌+1战力。
name: Blue Marvel

description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings to this location with the same Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：在此区域添加2张战力与之相同的布鲁德虫。
name: Brood

description: When this is destroyed, create the Winter Soldier in its place.
descriptionZh: 此牌被摧毁时在原地生成一张冬兵。
name: Bucky Barnes

description: On Reveal: The next card you draw will be a 2-Cost card. (if any are left)
name: Bullseye

description: On Reveal: Put the bottom card of your opponent's deck into your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将对手卡组的底牌加入你的手牌。
name: Cable

description: Ongoing: Your other cards at this location have +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：你在此区域的其他卡牌+1战力。
name: Captain America

description: At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)
descriptionZh: 此牌会在最终回合结束时移动到能为你赢下对战的区域（若能赢的话）。
name: Captain Marvel

description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.
descriptionZh: 揭示：摧毁你在此区域的其他卡牌，每摧毁1张就+2战力。
name: Carnage

description: Ongoing: Your highest Power cards get +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：你战力最高的卡牌+2战力。
name: Cerebro

description: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：下回合，双方均可将卡牌移动至此区域。
name: Cloak

description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：丢弃你手牌中能量消耗最低的卡牌。
name: Colleen Wing

description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.
descriptionZh: 持续：不会被摧毁、移动，战力也不会减少。
name: Colossus

description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen at this location.
descriptionZh: 持续：此区域揭示效果不触发。
name: Cosmo

description: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.
descriptionZh: 仅可在领先区域放置此卡牌。
name: Crossbones

description: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.
descriptionZh: 揭示：双方各抽1张牌。
name: Crystal

description: "Let's move, X-Men."
descriptionZh: “X战警，出发。”
name: Cyclops

description: When this moves to a location, +2 Power for each card your opponent has there.
descriptionZh: 当此卡牌移动至一个区域时，对手在那个区域每有1张卡牌，此卡牌+2战力。
name: Dagger

description: On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you make your own.
descriptionZh: 在第5回合，你在进行操作前可以先观看对手的操作。
name: Daredevil

description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's deck.
descriptionZh: 持续：对手卡组中每有1张卡牌，+2战力。
name: Darkhawk

description: Ongoing: If you have 4 cards at each location, +6 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：若你在每个区域都有4张卡牌，+6战力。
name: Dazzler

description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.
descriptionZh: 此牌被摧毁时战力翻倍，并会退回到你的手牌中。
name: Deadpool

description: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.
descriptionZh: 本局对战中每有1张卡牌被摧毁，能量消耗-1。
name: Death

description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：摧毁此区域中你的其他牌。
name: Deathlok

description: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.
descriptionZh: 揭示：为双方在其他区域中各添加1张石块。
name: Debrii

description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.
descriptionZh: 揭示：摧毁你的其他卡牌。
name: Destroyer

description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.
descriptionZh: 持续：你每有1张手牌，+2战力。
name: Devil Dinosaur

description: On Reveal: Add a 5-Power DoomBot to each other location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：在其他区域中各添加1张5战力的末日机器人。
name: Doctor Doom

description: On Reveal: Pull 4 random cards from your opponent's hand to their side of this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：随机将对手手牌中的4张牌放置于此敌方区域。
name: Doctor Octopus

description: On Reveal: Move your highest Power cards to this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你战力最高的牌移动至此区域。
name: Doctor Strange

description: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.
descriptionZh: 你只能在第2回合抽到此牌。
name: Domino

description: At the end of the game, discard a card from your hand. This has its Power.
descriptionZh: 最终回合结束时丢弃一张手牌，此牌获得其战力。
name: Dracula

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，+2战力。
name: Drax

description: You can't play this after turn 3. Ongoing: You can't play cards here.
descriptionZh: 第3回合后不可放置此卡牌。持续：你不可在此区域放置卡牌。
name: Ebony Maw

description: After your opponent plays an Ongoing card here, remove its abilities.
name: Echo

description: On Reveal: +1 Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.
descriptionZh: 揭示：+1最大能量。持续：你每回合只能放置1张卡牌。
name: Electro

description: On Reveal: Destroy a random enemy 1-Cost card at this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：随机摧毁对手此区域中1张初始能量消耗为1的卡牌。
name: Elektra

description: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, +1 Power.
name: Elsa Bloodstone

description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards at this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：移除此区域内所有持续卡牌的特殊效果。
name: Enchantress

description: On Reveal: Return your 1-Cost cards to your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你的初始能量消耗为1的卡牌退回手牌中。
name: Falcon

description: Ongoing: Adjacent locations have +1 Power.
name: Flatman

description: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：你放置的下一张卡牌+2战力。
name: Forge

description: On Reveal: If this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你在此区域仅有此牌，摧毁其他区域。
name: Galactus

description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand. Destroy a random enemy card.
descriptionZh: 揭示：丢弃一张手牌，随机摧毁一张敌方卡牌。
name: Gambit

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +5 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，+5战力。
name: Gamora

description: Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.)
descriptionZh: 持续：你的卡牌始终会后揭示。（卡牌的揭示效果会后触发。）
name: Ghost

description: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你丢弃的一张牌放回此区域。
name: Ghost Rider

description: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你放置的上一张卡牌移动至此区域。
name: Ghost-Spider

description: You can only play this at the left location.
descriptionZh: 你只能将此卡牌放置在左侧区域。
name: Giganto

description: On Reveal: Other cards can't be revealed this turn.
name: Goblin Queen

description: Ongoing: Nobody can play cards that cost 4, 5, or 6 at this location.
descriptionZh: 持续：双方不可在此区域放置能量消耗为4、5或6的卡牌。
name: Goose

description: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将此牌移交给对手。
name: Green Goblin

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，+2战力。
name: Groot

description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.
name: Gwenpool

description: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你下回合在此区域放置了卡牌，+2战力。
name: Hawkeye

description: On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -1 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：所有其他卡牌-1战力。
name: Hazmat

description: On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你的其他牌向左移动一个区域。
name: Heimdall

description: On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded from your hand to random locations.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将所有从你手牌中丢弃的卡牌复活至随机区域。
name: Hela

description: When you discard this from your hand, add 3 random cards to your hand.
descriptionZh: 当你从手牌中丢弃此卡牌时，将3张随机卡牌添加到你的手牌。
name: Helicarrier

description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：你将丢弃2张手牌。
name: Hellcow

description: At the start of the game, unlock the potential of your cards with no abilities.
descriptionZh: 对战开始时，解锁你无特殊效果的卡牌的隐藏效果。
name: High Evolutionary

description: On Reveal: Gain +2 Power for each other card you played this turn.
descriptionZh: 揭示：此回合你每放置1张卡牌，+2战力。
name: Hit Monkey

description: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将此牌移交给对手。
name: Hobgoblin

description: Ongoing: Tap this to see the top card of your deck.
descriptionZh: 持续：点击此卡来查看你卡组中最上面的卡牌。
name: Howard the Duck

description: "HULK SMASH!"
descriptionZh: “浩克猛砸！”
name: Hulk

description: On Reveal: Merge this card with a random friendly card at this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将此牌与此区域中的一张随机友方牌合并。
name: Hulkbuster

description: When this moves, double its Power.
descriptionZh: 此牌移动时，战力翻倍。
name: Human Torch

description: On Reveal: Give a random card in your opponent's hand +1 Cost. (maximum 6)
descriptionZh: 揭示：对手的1张随机手牌+1能量消耗（最高为6）
name: Iceman

description: Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.
descriptionZh: 持续：你在此区域放置的卡牌在对战结束之前不会揭开。
name: Invisible Woman

description: On Reveal: After you play your next card, move it one location to the left.
descriptionZh: 揭示：当你放置下一张牌后，其将向左移动一个区域。
name: Iron Fist

description: On Reveal: Copy the text of your deck's top card.
name: Iron Lad

description: Ongoing: Your total Power is doubled at this location.
descriptionZh: 持续：你在此区域的总战力翻倍。
name: Iron Man

description: On Reveal: Give 3 other friendly cards +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：使你的其他3张卡牌+2战力。
name: Ironheart

description: Ongoing: Your emotes are ruder.
name: J. Jonah Jameson

description: On Reveal: Draw all cards that Cost 0 from your deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：从你的卡组中抽取所有能量消耗为0的卡牌。
name: Jane Foster Mighty Thor

description: Ongoing: Players must play their first card here each turn. (if possible)
name: Jean Grey

description: You can move this once. Nothing can stop you from moving or playing this to any location.
descriptionZh: 你可以移动此卡牌一次。没什么能阻止你将此牌移动或放置到任意区域。
name: Jeff the Baby Land Shark

description: On Reveal: If you don't play a card here next turn, +4 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你下回合未在此区域放置卡牌，+4战力。
name: Jessica Jones

description: On Reveal: Add the top card of your deck to this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将你卡组中最上方的卡牌添加至此区域。
name: Jubilee

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played cards here this turn, move them randomly.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，则将它们移动到随机区域。
name: Juggernaut

description: Ongoing: Your 1-Cost cards have +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：你所有的初始能量消耗为1的卡牌+1战力。
name: Ka-Zar

description: On Reveal: Look at what your opponent did, then restart the turn. (without Kang)
descriptionZh: 揭示：检视对手的操作，然后重新开始此回合（康会消失）。
name: Kang

description: On Reveal: Destroy ALL 1-Cost cards.
descriptionZh: 揭示：摧毁所有初始能量消耗为1的卡牌。
name: Killmonger

description: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +4 Power.
name: King Eitri

description: When a card moves here on turn 6, destroy it.
descriptionZh: 当第6回合有牌移动至此区域，摧毁那张牌。
name: Kingpin

description: When this returns to your hand, +2 Power. Returns at the start of each turn.
descriptionZh: 每回合开始时，此牌会退回到手牌，并+2战力。
name: Kitty Pryde

description: Ongoing: The location to the right has +6 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：所在区域的右侧区域+6战力。
name: Klaw

description: Ongoing: Has the combined Power of all cards destroyed this game.
descriptionZh: 持续：此牌战力为本局对战中所有被摧毁牌的战力之和。
name: Knull

description: On Reveal: Shuffle a Rock into your opponent's deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将一张石块洗进对手卡组。
name: Korg

description: When a card moves here, this gets +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 当有卡牌移动至此区域时，此卡牌+2战力。
name: Kraven

description: On Reveal: Destroy the enemy card with the highest Power at this location.
name: Lady Deathstrike

description: On Reveal: Discard the highest-cost card from your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：丢弃你手牌中能量消耗最高的卡牌。
name: Lady Sif

description: On Reveal: Copy the enemy card(s) with the highest Power played this turn, but on your side.
descriptionZh: 复制对手在此回合放置的战力最高的牌，并添加至你对应的区域。
name: Leader

description: At the start of turn 6, remove all abilities from cards in your opponent's hand.
descriptionZh: 第六回合开始时，移除对手手牌的所有特殊效果。
name: Leech

description: On Reveal: Replace each other location with this one.
name: Legion

description: Ongoing: -4 Power if your opponent has 4 cards here.
descriptionZh: 持续：若对手在此区域有4张牌，-4战力。
name: Lizard

description: After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck. (once per turn)
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会将其替换为你卡组中的一张卡牌。（每回合一次）
name: Lockjaw

description: Ongoing: Your cards can't have their Power reduced.
descriptionZh: 持续：你的牌无法被降低战力。
name: Luke Cage

description: If this is in your deck at the end of the game, it jumps to a random location.
descriptionZh: 若此牌在最终回合结束时仍在卡组中，则将其随机放置到一个区域。
name: M'Baku

description: You can't play this on turn 6. On Reveal: Change this location to 'Limbo'.
descriptionZh: 第6回合不可放置此卡牌。揭示：将此区域改为“地狱边境”。
name: Magik

description: On Reveal: Move all opposing 3 and 4-Cost cards to this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将所有初始能量消耗为3和4的对手卡牌移动至此区域。
name: Magneto

description: When you draw this, place it at a random location.
name: Makkari

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, draw a card from their deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，则从其卡组中抽1张卡牌。
name: Mantis

description: On Reveal: Add a random 1-Cost card to your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：随机将一张初始能量消耗为1的卡牌添加到你的手牌中。
name: Maria Hill

description: On Reveal: Add 2 Sentinel to your opponent's hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将2张哨兵机器人添加到对手手牌。
name: Master Mold

description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws 2 cards.
descriptionZh: 揭示：你的对手抽2张牌。
name: Maximus

description: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若此卡牌在中间区域，+2战力。
name: Medusa

description: If you win this game, double your winnings.
name: Mephisto

description: If a card moved last turn, this costs 1.
descriptionZh: 若上个回合有卡牌移动过，则此卡牌的能量消耗为1。
name: Miles Morales

description: On Reveal: Copy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.
name: Mirage

description: Ongoing: Adjacent locations have +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：相邻区域+2战力。
name: Mister Fantastic

description: On Reveal: Swap the Power and Cost of all cards in your deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将卡组中所有卡牌的能量消耗与战力互换。
name: Mister Negative

description: On Reveal: Add a Sinister Clone to this location with the same Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：在此区域添加1张战力与之相同的惊恶克隆体。
name: Mister Sinister

description: "We've got to save this city."
descriptionZh: “我们必须拯救这座城市。”
name: Misty Knight

description: On Reveal: Discard your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：丢弃你的手牌。
name: MODOK

description: Ongoing: If both players have 4 cards at this location, +6 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：若双方在此区域各有4张卡牌，+6战力。
name: Mojo

description: On Reveal: Duplicate your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：复制你的手牌。
name: Moon Girl

description: On Reveal: Discard a card from each player's hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：双方均丢弃1张手牌。
name: Moon Knight

description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each time you discarded a card this game.
descriptionZh: 持续：本局对战中你每丢弃1张卡牌，+2战力。
name: Morbius

description: On Reveal: Become a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：变为对手手牌中随机一张牌的复制。
name: Morph

description: Ongoing: If this is your only card here, adjacent locations have +5 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：若此卡牌是你在此区域中的唯一卡牌，相邻区域+5战力。
name: Ms. Marvel

description: When this moves, add a copy to the old location.
descriptionZh: 此卡牌移动后，原区域添加1张它的复制。
name: Multiple Man

description: As you play this, play Illusions to other locations. Disguise this as an Illusion until the game ends.
descriptionZh: 当你放置此卡牌时，在其他区域中放置“幻觉”，并将此牌伪装成“幻觉”直至对战结束。
name: Mysterio

description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an Ongoing, copy its text. (if it's in play)
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你放置的上张卡牌有持续效果且在场上，复制其卡面文字。
name: Mystique

description: On Reveal: Give the 2 leftmost cards in your hand +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：使你手牌中左边的2张卡牌+2战力。
name: Nakia

description: Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.
descriptionZh: 持续：若此卡牌是你在此区域中的唯一卡牌，+5战力。
name: Namor

description: Each turn your opponent doesn't play a card here, +2 Power. (except the turn you play this)
descriptionZh: 每回合如果你的对手没有在此区域放置卡牌，+2战力（除你放置的那回合外）。
name: Nebula

description: After ANY card is played here, destroy this card AND that card.
descriptionZh: 任意卡牌被放置到此区域后，会摧毁此卡牌与该卡牌。
name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead

description: On Reveal: Add 3 random 6-Cost cards to your hand.
name: Nick Fury

description: On Reveal: Add all cards you discarded or destroyed last turn to your hand.
name: Night Nurse

description: You can move this once.
descriptionZh: 你可移动此牌一次。
name: Nightcrawler

description: When this is destroyed, add a copy to each other location.
descriptionZh: 此卡牌被摧毁时，在其他区域中各添加一张此卡牌的复制。
name: Nimrod

description: When this is destroyed, give your cards +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 此卡牌被摧毁时，你的所有卡牌+1战力。
name: Nova

description: On Reveal: Activate the On Reveal abilities of your other cards at this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：触发此区域你其他牌的揭示效果。
name: Odin

description: On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：使你卡组中所有卡牌+1战力。
name: Okoye

description: Ongoing: If you're ahead by 10 Power here, +4 Power to other locations.
descriptionZh: 持续：若你在此区域领先10点战力，则其他区域各+4战力。
name: Omega Red

description: Ongoing: Double your other Ongoing effects at this location.
descriptionZh: 持续：此区域中你的其他持续效果翻倍。
name: Onslaught

description: Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.
descriptionZh: 持续：若此卡牌是你在此区域中的唯一卡牌，+5战力。
name: Orka

description: Ongoing: Your cards with no abilities have +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：你没有特殊效果的牌+2战力。
name: Patriot

description: On Reveal: Move an opposing 1 or 2-Cost card to this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将1张初始能量消耗为1或2的对手卡牌移动至此区域。
name: Polaris

description: Ongoing: Lock down this location. (Cards can't be added, removed, etc.)
descriptionZh: 持续：锁定此区域。（不可在此区域添加、移除卡牌等。）
name: Professor X

description: On Reveal: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.
descriptionZh: 揭示：下回合+1能量。
name: Psylocke

description: Ongoing: +1 Power for each opposing card at this location.
descriptionZh: 持续：对手在此区域每有1张卡牌，+1战力。
name: Punisher

description: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, swap the positions of each location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若此牌在中间区域，则调换所有区域的位置。
name: Quake

description: Starts in your opening hand.
descriptionZh: 必定出现于起始手牌中。
name: Quicksilver

description: Ongoing: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost 1 less. (minimum 1)
descriptionZh: 持续：对战开始时不在你卡组中的卡牌-1能量消耗。（最低为1）
name: Quinjet

description: On Reveal: Set this card's Power equal to the Power of a random card in your deck.
name: Random

description: On Reveal: You must play a card here next turn.
name: Red Guardian

description: Ongoing: Enemy cards at this location have +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：此区域的对手卡牌+1战力。
name: Red Skull

description: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +5 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你下回合在此区域放置了卡牌，+5战力。
name: Rescue

description: On Reveal: Ruin this location. (remove its ability)
descriptionZh: 揭示：毁掉此区域（移除区域特殊效果）。
name: Rhino

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，+2战力。
name: Rocket Raccoon

description: On Reveal: Shuffle 2 Rocks into your opponent's deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将2张石块洗入对手卡组。
name: Rockslide

description: On Reveal: Steal an Ongoing ability from a random enemy card at this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：从此区域的敌方卡牌中随机偷取一个持续效果。
name: Rogue

description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's hand.
descriptionZh: 持续：对手每有1张手牌，+2战力。
name: Ronan the Accuser

description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand. It costs 0.
descriptionZh: 当此卡牌被摧毁时，会退回到你的手牌中。能量消耗为0。
name: Sabretooth

description: Ongoing: Players can only play 1 card a turn.
descriptionZh: 持续：双方每回合只可放置1张卡牌。
name: Sandman

description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：移除你手牌和卡组中所有持续卡牌的特殊效果。
name: Sauron

description: On Reveal: Replace this location with a random new one.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将此区域随机替换为新区域。
name: Scarlet Witch

description: On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent's hand with -1 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：对手所有手牌-1战力。
name: Scorpion

description: On Reveal: Add another Sentinel to your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将另一张哨兵机器人添加到你的手牌。
name: Sentinel

description: You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -10 Power Void to the right location.
descriptionZh:
此卡牌无法放置在右侧区域。
揭示：向右侧区域添加1张-10战力的虚无。
name: Sentry

description: Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost 1 less. (minimum 1)
descriptionZh: 持续：你所有的手牌-1能量消耗。（最低为1）
name: Sera

description: On Reveal: Set all cards here to their original base Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：使此区域所有卡牌的战力变为各自的初始基础值。
name: Shadow King

description: On Reveal: Destroy all enemy cards at this location that have 9 or more Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：摧毁对手在此区域中所有战力大于或等于9的卡牌。
name: Shang-Chi

description: On Reveal: Add a random 1-Cost card to each location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：随机将1张初始能量消耗为1的卡牌添加到每个区域。
name: Shanna

description: Costs 1 less for each unspent Energy last turn.
descriptionZh: 每有一点上回合未消耗的能量，能量消耗-1。
name: She-Hulk

description: "I'm gonna blast you!"
descriptionZh: “我要震爆你们！”
name: Shocker

description: On Reveal: If you play your next card here, double its Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你在此区域放置下一张卡牌，其战力翻倍。
name: Shuri

description: After ANY card is played here, this moves to another location.
descriptionZh: 任意卡牌被放置到此区域后，此卡牌会移动到另一区域。
name: Silk

description: You can only play this at a location where you have 6+ total Power.
name: Silver Sable

description: When this is discarded from your hand, draw a card.
name: Silver Samurai

description: On Reveal: Give your other 3-Cost cards +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：你其他的初始能量消耗为3的卡牌+2战力。
name: Silver Surfer

description: While in your hand, this transforms each turn into a Hawk or a Bear.
descriptionZh: 此卡牌在你手牌中时，每一回合都会变为鹰或熊。
name: Snowguard

description: On Reveal: Give your Ongoing cards +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：你所有的持续卡牌+2战力。
name: Spectrum

description: On Reveal: Transform the highest-cost card in your opponent's hand into a Pig, keeping its Power and Cost.
name: Spider-Ham

description: On Reveal: Your opponent can't play cards at this location next turn.
descriptionZh: 揭示：对手下回合无法在此区域放置卡牌。
name: Spider-Man

description: The first time this moves to a location, destroy an enemy card there.
name: Spider-Man 2099

description: On Reveal: Afflict all enemy cards here with -1 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：此区域所有敌方卡牌-1战力。
name: Spider-Woman

description: On Reveal: Add a 1-Power Squirrel to each other location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：在其他区域中各添加1张1战力的松鼠。
name: Squirrel Girl

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +3 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：若对手此回合在此区域放置了卡牌，+3战力。
name: Star-Lord

description: Costs 1 if your opponent discarded a card from their hand this game.
descriptionZh: 如果对手在本局对战中丢弃了1张卡牌，则此卡牌的能量消耗为1。
name: Stature

description: On Reveal: Move an enemy card from here to another location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将此区域中的一张敌方卡牌移至其他区域。
name: Stegron

description: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.
descriptionZh: 揭示：冲毁此区域。下回合过后，双方不可在此区域放置卡牌。
name: Storm

description: Ongoing: If your hand is empty, +6 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：若你没有手牌，+6战力。
name: Strong Guy

description: If your opponent has 12+ Power here at the end of any turn, destroy this.
name: Stryfe

description: At the end of each turn, gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.
descriptionZh: 每回合结束时，每有一点未消耗的能量，+1战力。
name: Sunspot

description: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of all enemy cards.
descriptionZh: 持续：获得所有敌方卡牌的持续效果。
name: Super-Skrull

description: If you move the Human Torch to this location, +10 Power.
name: Surtur

description: When this is discarded from your hand, add two copies that Cost 0 to your hand.
descriptionZh: 此卡牌从你的手牌中丢弃时，将2张复制添加到你的手牌中，这2张复制的能量消耗为0。
name: Swarm

description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：丢弃一张手牌。
name: Sword Master

description: On Reveal: Set this card's Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if that card's in play)
descriptionZh: 揭示：若你放置的上张卡牌效果尚在场上，则将此牌的战力改为与其相同。
name: Taskmaster

description: At the start of the game, shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.
descriptionZh: 对战开始时，将六张无限宝石洗进你的卡组。
name: Thanos

description: When a card enters your hand from anywhere (except your deck), +1 Power.
descriptionZh: 每当有卡牌从任意位置（你的卡组除外）添加到你的手牌，此卡牌+1战力。
name: The Collector

description: On Reveal: Add a Demon to your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将1张恶魔添加到你的手牌。
name: The Hood

description: If you played a card last turn, you can't play this.
descriptionZh: 若你在上个回合中放置了卡牌，则无法放置此卡牌。
name: The Infinaut

description: Ongoing: Split your total Power evenly among all locations.
descriptionZh: 持续：将你的战力平分至所有区域。
name: The Living Tribunal

description: On Reveal: Revive one of your destroyed cards and merge with it. That card can move each turn.
name: The Phoenix Force

description: "It's clobberin' time!"
descriptionZh: “胖揍时间到！”
name: The Thing

description: On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将雷神之锤洗进你的卡组。
name: Thor

description: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.
descriptionZh: 任意卡牌被放置到此区域后，此卡牌会换边。
name: Titania

description: On Reveal: Move the last card you played to this location.
name: Toad

description: Ongoing: Your other cards have -1 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：你的其他牌-1战力。
name: Typhoid Mary

description: Once this is in your hand, you can see the unrevealed locations.
descriptionZh: 此牌出现在你的手牌后，你可以看到未揭示的区域效果。
name: Uatu the Watcher

description: On Reveal: Create four 1-Power Drones at each other location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：在其他区域中各放置四张1战力的无人机。
name: Ultron

description: When this card is destroyed, add Spider-Man to your hand.
name: Uncle Ben

description: On Reveal: Set ALL cards at this location to 3 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将此区域中的所有牌改为3战力。
name: Valkyrie

description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location. Add their Power to this card.
descriptionZh: 揭示：摧毁此区域中你的其他卡牌，将其战力加在此牌上。
name: Venom

description: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of one of your other cards at this location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：将此区域你的另一张牌移交给对手。
name: Viper

description: You can move this each turn.
descriptionZh: 你每个回合均可移动此牌。
name: Vision

description: When you move a card to a location, move this card there as well.
name: Viv Vision

description: When this card moves, +5 Power.
descriptionZh: 当此卡牌移动时，+5战力。
name: Vulture

description: Ongoing: Your 1-Cost cards have +1 Power.
name: War Machine

description: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +4 Power.
descriptionZh: 持续：若你有空置区域，+4战力。
name: Warpath

description: "My secret power is that I get things done."
descriptionZh: “我的超能力是解决问题。”
name: Wasp

description: On Reveal: All cards cost 4 until the end of next turn.
descriptionZh: 揭示：在下一回合结束前，所有卡牌的能量消耗都为4。
name: Wave

description: On Reveal: Copy the highest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
descriptionZh: 揭示：复制对手手牌中能量消耗最高的卡牌到你的手牌。
name: White Queen

description: On Reveal: Add a 7-Power Tiger to another location.
descriptionZh: 揭示：在另一区域中添加1张7战力的灵虎。
name: White Tiger

description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.
name: Witchfire

description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.
descriptionZh: 揭示：此区域你每有1张其他卡牌，+2战力。
name: Wolfsbane

description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location with +2 Power.
descriptionZh: 此卡牌被丢弃或摧毁时，重新将其添加至一个随机区域并+2战力。
name: Wolverine

description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities at this location happen twice.
descriptionZh: 持续：此区域中你的揭示效果触发两次。
name: Wong

description: When this is discarded from your hand, put it back. It costs 0.
name: X-23

description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards at this location with -1 Power.
descriptionZh: 揭示：此区域中你的其他牌-1战力。
name: Yellowjacket

description: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.
name: Yo-Yo

description: On Reveal: Destroy the top card of your opponent's deck.
descriptionZh: 揭示：摧毁对手卡组中最上方的卡牌。
name: Yondu

description: Ongoing: Your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less. (minimum 1)
descriptionZh: 持续：你所有初始能量消耗为4的卡牌-1能量消耗。（最低为1）
name: Zabu

description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
descriptionZh: 揭示：移除你放置的下一张卡牌的特殊效果。
name: Zero
